reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: Improvement of the value chain of honey in Boaco, Nicaragua

description.narrative: ISF continues its long-term partnership with Tierra Nueva, which is economically independent union for 8 member cooperatives in Central Nicaragua, Boaco area. Tierra Nueva has succeeded, with the support of ISF, to market coffee and honey as main products of its member producers. However, due to the changing environmental conditions, the production of coffee and honey is not enought to brong sustainable income to all small producers. More diversification of production is needed, as well as more organisation al support in terms of implementing gender equality in Tierra Nueva and its member cooperatives. This is why a new project will be planned during 2016 in order to cope with the new challenges aroused in the area. The specific objective, expected results an d indicators will be formulated in a participatory planning process during 2016.
